sentences.en: Have done with your foolish sophism.
How many times had he risen to his feet in the combat, held fast to the rock, leaning against sophism, dragged in the dust, now getting the upper hand of his conscience, again overthrown by it!
sentences.cn: 多少次，他在斗争中重新站起来，抓住岩石，依仗诡辩，在尘埃里打滚，有时他把良心压在身下，有时又被良心打翻！

sentences.en: If it believed in its own essence, would it … seek refuge in hypocrisy and sophism?
sentences.cn: 如果它相信它自己的本质的话，那么它会……在虚伪和诡辩中寻求庇护么？

sentences.en: It is sophism to connect physiological needs with morality.
sentences.cn: 片面地把生理问题与所谓“道德”混同起来，根本上就是诡辩。

sentences.en: Liang Ke Shuo" of Dengxi used to be regarded as a sophism."
sentences.cn: 邓析的“两可说”历来被视为是诡辩。

words.tran_cn: 复杂；诡辩；老于世故；有教养
弄复杂；使变得世故；曲解
